scripts.install-all: yarn && cd app && yarn && cd ../functions && yarn && cd ..
scripts.build:functions: cd functions && yarn lint && yarn build && cd ..
scripts.deploy: yarn deploy:app && yarn deploy:functions && yarn deploy:rules
scripts.deploy:prod: yarn deploy:app:prod && yarn deploy:functions:prod && yarn deploy:rules:prod
scripts.deploy:app: PUBLIC_URL=https://goracerunner-dev.web.app yarn build:app && yarn robots:dev && firebase deploy -P default --only hosting
scripts.deploy:app:prod: PUBLIC_URL=https://goracerunner.web.app yarn build:app && yarn robots:prod && firebase deploy -P production --only hosting
scripts.deploy:functions: yarn build:functions && firebase deploy -P default --only functions
scripts.deploy:functions:prod: yarn build:functions && firebase deploy -P production --only functions
scripts.release: git checkout master; git pull origin master; standard-version
scripts.release:finish: git checkout develop; git pull; git merge master; git push
